mapper.sql: id, user_id, university_id, stu_no, begin_learn_date, grade, specialty_id, class_id, political_id, live_room, home_address_id, phone_ecomm_id, datetime, by_who, deleted
mapper.select:
select
from student where user_id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and deleted = 0 order by user_id ASC
select stu_no from student where class_id = #{classId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and deleted = 0 order by user_id ASC

select
from student where class_id = #{classId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and deleted = 0 order by user_id ASC
select user_id from student where class_id = #{classId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and deleted = 0 order by user_id ASC
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()

mapper.update: update student set deleted = 1 where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and deleted = 0

update student
